subject: Request for update
body:
Hi team,
Just checking in on the status of the Q3 report. Maybe we could share a draft by next week?

subject: Follow-up meeting
body:
Hello,
I think we should meet to finalize the scope. Could we meet tomorrow at 3pm in the office?

subject: Support issue
body:
Hey there,
The app is kind of slow on startup. Could you please advise next steps?

subject: Coffee chat
body:
Hi,
Perhaps we could grab coffee this week to discuss collaboration?
